body_html: Didn't realize about my gist being used! I actually had a much nicer version so I've updated the gist ( https://gist.github.com/rtqichen/b22a9c6bfc4f36e605a7b3ac1ab4122f ) with it. The code should be general enough for others to adapt it to their specific needs. (Though tbh I never actually used it for anything.)
